title: André Rischmann
text: André Rischmann (26 January 1882, in <a href="Paris">Paris</a> – 9 November 1955) was a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who competed in the <a href="1900%20Summer%20Olympics">1900 Summer Olympics</a>. He was a member of the French rugby union team, which won the gold medal.
